description: misc/notepadplus: add syntax and completion support for notepad++

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, adg (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

http://codereview.appspot.com/4274072/diff/7002/misc/notepadplus/go.xml
File misc/notepadplus/go.xml (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/4274072/diff/7002/misc/notepadplus/go.xml#newcode10
misc/notepadplus/go.xml:10: <KeyWord name="complex" />
exchange complex and close to put them in alphabetical order

http://codereview.appspot.com/4274072/diff/7002/misc/notepadplus/userDefineLang.xml
File misc/notepadplus/userDefineLang.xml (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/4274072/diff/7002/misc/notepadplus/userDefineLang.xml#newcode12
misc/notepadplus/userDefineLang.xml:12: <Keywords name="Operators">( ) [ ] { } ... . , _ & ^ %  > < ! =</Keywords>
this list of operators looks meager
http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#Operators_and_Delimiters

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
Looks reasonable to me, but I don't like the + characters in the directory name. Perhaps "notepadplusplus" instead?

ok, change to notepadplus -- this is the directory used by the official repo: http://svn.tuxfamily.org/notepadplus/repository/

On Mar 23, 2011, at 1:28 AM, adg@golang.org wrote:

> Looks reasonable to me, but I don't like the + characters in the
> directory name. Perhaps "notepadplusplus" instead?
> 
> 
> http://codereview.appspot.com/4274072/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, adg, peterGo (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Did you hg upload? Still looks like notepad++ to me.
